entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test: Convert query tests to conditional theory #27229
  • EF Core 6.0 temporal tables - Support specifying precision for PeriodEnd and PeriodStart columns #27228
  • Allow non-nullable struct entity property to be DB optional, if conversion to/from nullable type defined. #27227
  • Collection Navigation Property is not Loading #27226
  • When inserting data, the navigation property is empty and an error will be reported #27225
  • EF Core 6.0 temporal tables - Support specifying HISTORY_RETENTION_PERIOD #27224
  • Cosmos test failure due to line format mismatch #27222

Closed

  • GroupBy debug assert: Missing alias in the list: p1,p #26104
    7.0.0
  • Query: Make ScalarSubqueryExpression fully immutable #26532
    7.0.0
  • .Set<> then .Any() fails after second time with .NET 6.0.100-rc.1.21458.32 / Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer 6.0.0-rc.1.21452.10 #26167
    7.0.0
  • 'variable '__p_1' of type 'System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1[FileModel]' referenced from scope '', but it is not defined' #26964
    7.0.0
  • Error with HasConversion in EF.Core.Tools 6.0.1 #27201
  • Deleting entities is having problems #27221

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/2.1] Stop building w/ VS2017 in CI #27233
  • Update branding to preview1 #27232
  • [release/6.0] RevEng: Don't use nameof syntax (#26622) #27231
    Servicing-consider
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27230
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • Query: Mark SelectExpression as immutable after projection has been applied #27011
    auto-merge
  • Query: Don't skip any parameter in projection #27008
    auto-merge
  • [release/6.0] Query: Match joined tables properly when lifting for group by aggregate #27170
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.3
  • Update NorthwindMiscellaneousQueryCosmosTest.cs #27223
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Fix to #26676 - EF Core 6 - IsTemporal adds an unnecessary migration when DefaultSchema is configured at the DbContext Level #27198
  • Add support for index sort order (descending) #27210
  • [release/6.0] Revert change to delete dependent when optional FK with cascade delete is set to null #27216
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.3
